inlineContent.text: The methods that require authorization scopes and/or an access token that was
issued on behalf of a user are declared in conditional conformances where
protocol requires conforming types to support authorization scopes. This
strategy provides a compile-time guarantee that you cannot call methods that
require authorization scopes if you are using an authorization manager that
is not a conforming type because it does not support authorization scopes.
All of the endpoints are documented at the the

abstract.text: The central class in this library. Provides methods for all of the Spotify web
API endpoints and contains an authorization manager for managing the
authorization process of your application.
Get the saved episodes for the current user.
Get a Track.
Check if one or more shows is saved in the current user’s “Your Music”
library.

Manages the authorization process for the Authorization Code Flow with Proof
Key for Code Exchange (PKCE).
Makes a request to the “/playlists/{playlistId}/tracks” endpoint and allows
you to specify fields to filter the query.
Logs messages when the authorization information changes.
